demoExpired.title: Demo Expired
demoExpired.canUpgrade: Thanks for trying the Sandstorm Demo! Your demo account has expired. If you'd like to continue using Sandstorm and make your data permanent, please sign in.
demoExpired.cannotUpgrade: Thanks for trying the Sandstorm Demo! Your demo account has expired.

demoModal.header: Sandstorm is a self-hostable web productivity suite.
demoModal.withoutAppDemo: with all the apps you need in one place.
demoModal.explanation: Sandstorm makes it easy to run apps on your own server. In addition to improving privacy and control, this brings Open Source apps to a wide audience.
demoModal.securityOverview: Sandstorm is also ridiculously secure. If security interests you, check out Sandstorm's security model overview.

signup.title: 要求邀請

signedUp.keyIsUsedWithOrigin: 註冊成功！來去下載應用程式吧。
signedUp.keyIsNotUsed: 您已經有帳號了，不需要這把註冊金鑰。

signup.keyIsUsed: 抱歉，這把註冊金鑰已經被用掉了。
signup.signInGuide: 您需要先登入。__First, you have to sign in. Click "Sign in" in the upper-right.
signup.invalidKey: 抱歉，這個註冊金鑰無效。

uploadTest.title: Upload test page
uploadTest.explanation: This page is intended for use by the test scripts.

isPaid.title: Get up to 30 GB of free space when your friends share on Oasis!
isPaid.explanation: For each friend that creates a sharing link, we'll reward you with 2 GB.

isNotPaid.title: Get unlimited grains & up to 2 GB of free space when your friends share on Oasis!
isNotPaid.explanation: For each friend that creates a sharing link, we'll reward you with 50 MB. You'll also get unlimited grains.

howTo.title: Sharing is referring
howTo.explanation: To get started, open any grain and click Share access.

getStart.step1: You share a grain with your friend (who isn't already an Oasis user).
getStart.step3: Your friend shares a grain with any other person (including you).

status.title: Your referrals & status
status.explanation: Once you send a sharing link out, people will appear in this list after they sign in.

pending.title: Still needs to share
pending.explanation: Tell these people to make a grain and share it with you. You must actually view the grain they shared with you!

success.title: Successful referrals
success.explanation: You've successfully referred these people. Congratulations!

finePrint.title: The fine print
finePrint.warningWithAccountLink: Your referral bonus lasts until 1 year after the referral. The terms of this referral program may change without warning; however, such changes will not affect bonuses you have already received. If you need even more space, upgrade your account.
finePrint.explanation: Paid subscribers can get up to 30 GB of free storage, 2 GB per person they refer, in addition to the storage from their account level. Free account holders can earn unlimited grains and 50 MB of free storage per person they refer, up to 2 GB total.

intro.explanation: 沙聚雲(Sandstorm.io)是可以執行私人或個人網路應用程式的開源平台。使用者可以上傳並安裝任何程式，就像手機的應用程式商店一樣。為了保護隱私，這是唯一公開開源網路應用程式的方式。
intro.unofficialWarning: WARNING: This server is running an unofficial build of Sandstorm which may contain modifications not reviewed by the developers.

corporate.title: 贊助者
corporate.explanation: These companies contributed heavily to Sandstorm's crowdfunding campaign.

individual.title: Key indivisual sponsors
individual.explanation: These individuals contributed heavily to Sandstorm's crowdfunding campaign.

dependencies.title: Third-party works used
dependencies.explanation: These works are copyright the respective authors and used under the terms of the respective licenses.

copyright.title: 著作權
copyright.license: The Sandstorm implementation is copyright by Sandstorm Development Group, Inc. and contributors. The implementation is licensed under the Apache License 2.0.
copyright.trademark: "Sandstorm" and the Sandstorm logo are trademarks of Sandstorm Development Group, Inc., and may not be used to advertise derivative works nor commercial services without written consent from Sandstorm Development Group, Inc.

requestAccess.warnIdentityRevealing: 要求存取權將把您的完整身份告知沙粒擁有者。
requestAccess.waitForApproving: 要求已送出，若獲核准則會以電郵通知您。
requestAccess.signInPlease: 若要要求存取權，請先登入。

revokedShareLink.linkRevoked: 非常抱歉，這個連結已經被撤銷。

whoHasAccessPopup.noLoggedInUsers: 未曾有已登入的使用者造訪這個連結過。

emailInviteTab.demoModeAlert: Sharing emails cannot be sent while in demo mode. Create an account to send sharing emails, or get a shareable link instead.

shareableLinkTab.labelExplanation: 標籤可用來備註這個連結是創來給誰用的。

grainSharePopup.upgradeDescription: You can upgrade this grain to the new model, but anyone with whom you shared this grain previously will lose access; you will have to share with them again.

share.signIn: 您必須登入才能進行分享。

styleguide.title: Sandstorm style guide
styleguide.note: (note: this is a work in progress.)

copyRules.title: Copy rules
copyRules.rule1: Be terse but clear.  Avoid technical terms where less-technical ones will do.
copyRules.rule2: Capitalize the first letter of the first word of a section heading or button.  Do not capitalize the second word, or anything else, unless referring to a proper noun like Google or GitHub.
copyRules.rule3: Use verbs for text on buttons. The button text should describe what clicking that button will do.
copyRules.rule4: Use nouns for text which is a link.  The link text should indicate what the link will take you to.
copyRules.rule5: Use nouns for basically everything else, too, to communicate the information architecture. Section headings should be nouns which describe the content of the section.  Labels should be nouns which describe the content of the field.

styleRules.title: Style rules
styleRules.rule1: Stick to a limited color palette.  (TODO: add specific colors)
styleRules.rule2: Use typefaces no smaller than 13px for text content.  Readability is important and not everyone has young eyes.
styleRules.rule3: Make click targets no smaller than 32px square or 26px tall if appreciably wider.  Remember that due to Fitts' Law, larger click targets are easier to interact with.

forms.title: Forms
forms.rule2: The primary action button of a form should be at the bottom right of the form. Secondary buttons should line up to the left of that primary action button.
forms.rule3: When providing text input fields, place labels above the input, not side-by-side or inside the field as placeholder text.  Place additional explanation or instructions below the input. Placeholder text should be used for examples, not instructions.
forms.rule4: Forms are generally used for transactional interactions, where the user cares about the success or failure of the application.  Avoid optimistic UI in favor of multi-state UI which communicates network activity, success, and failure.  A common pattern is:
forms.rule4-1: Have the default state of the form.  Disable a save button until the user makes a change.
forms.rule4-2: When the user clicks an action button, start the RPC, and disable the entire form to indicate that the action is underway.
forms.rule4-3: When the RPC completes, if the RPC failed, show an error message at the top of the context over which the action applies.  If the RPC succeeded, either indicate a success message (again, at the top of the context over which the action applies) or if this was a modal interaction and the completion of the RPC indicates successful completion of the workflow, dismiss the form with no additional message.

example.title: An example:
example.label: Email
example.subtext: You might want to receive notifications.

newAdmin.wildcardHostBroken: 警告：本伺服器似乎把 WILDCARD_HOST 設定錯了。在修復此問題前，您無法使用任何應用程式。您可以參照本篇沙聚雲文件和您瀏覽器的 Javascript 記錄取得更多資訊。您必須調整 DNS、SSL/TLS certificates，或編輯 sandstorm.conf 檔案。如果您想要測試問題是否已修復，請重新整理此頁面。如果您仍然有問題，請在此開一個 issue。
newAdmin.websocketBroken: 警告：本伺服器似乎無法建立 WebSocket。沙聚雲也許看起來沒有問題，但許多應用程式會無法正常執行。更多資訊在此。通常這是因為上層的 reverse proxy （比如 nginx 或 Apache）需要被重新設定。如果您認為不是，請重新整理此頁面或在此開一個 issue。
newAdmin.hasSetupToken: 您並非以管理者身份登入，但您的設置 token 是正確的。您現在可以啟動設置精靈或檢視系統記錄。
newAdmin.hasNoSetupToken: 您並非以管理者身份登入，無法使用管理面板。請以管理者身份登入，或在主機終端上執行`sandstorm admin-token`來取得管理 token。

identity.subtext: 設定使用者可以如何登入。

emailConfig.subtext: 設定沙聚雲如何寄送電郵。

personalization.name: 個人化
personalization.subtext: 客製獨自的啟動畫面、服務條款、隱私權聲明等等。

preinstalledApps.name: 預裝應用程式
preinstalledApps.subtext: 選擇新使用者可以直接使用的預裝應用程式。

appSources.name: 應用程式來源
appSources.subtext: 取得應用程式和更新的位置。

newAdminIdentity.explanation: 選擇使用者可以用哪些方法進行身份認證。所有人都能登入，但只有您邀請的使用者可以安裝應用程式或建立沙粒。

adminIdentityProviderConfigureEmail.title: 電郵登入設定
adminIdentityProviderConfigureEmail.warning: 備註：若要使用電郵登入，您也需要設定伺服器的電郵寄送功能。
adminIdentityProviderConfigureEmail.explanation: 電郵登入沒有額外的設定選項。

googleLoginSetupInstructions.explanation: First, you'll need to get a Google Client ID. Follow these steps:
googleLoginSetupInstructions.step2: "Create Project", if needed. Wait for Google to finish provisioning.
googleLoginSetupInstructions.step3: On the left sidebar, go to "Credentials" and, on the right, "OAuth consent screen". Make sure to enter an email address and a product name, and save.
googleLoginSetupInstructions.step4: On the left sidebar, go to "Credentials".  Click the "Create credentials" button, then select "OAuth client ID" as the type.
googleLoginSetupInstructions.step5: Select "Web application" as your application type.
googleLoginSetupInstructions.step6: Set Authorized Javascript Origins to: %s

adminIdentityProviderConfigureGoogle.title: Google login configuration
adminIdentityProviderConfigureGoogle.formerBaseUrlWarning: This server moved from __former__ to __current__. You'll need to visit https://console.developers.google.com/ and update the "Authorized Javascript Origins" and "Authorized Redirect URI" for this Client ID to include the values below.
adminIdentityProviderConfigureGoogle.explanation: Then, copy over your Client ID and Client secret below:

githubLoginSetupInstructions.explanation: First, you'll need to get a Github Client ID and Client secret. Follow these steps:

adminIdentityProviderConfigureGitHub.title: GitHub login configuration
adminIdentityProviderConfigureGitHub.formerBaseUrlWarning: This server moved from __former__ to __current__. You'll need to visit https://github.com/settings/developers and update the Homepage URL and Authorization callback URL for this application to the values below.
adminIdentityProviderConfigureGitHub.explanation: Then, copy over your Client ID and Client secret below:

searchBindDn.label: Bind user DN
searchBindDn.subtext: The DN to bind as when searching for a user in the tree, e.g. cn=admin,ou=users,dc=example,dc=com. Optional, but needed if your server doesn't allow unauthenticated searches.

searchBindPassword.label: Bind user password
searchBindPassword.subtext: Optional, needed if specifying bind DN above.

base.label: Base DN
base.subtext: The root object under which to search for user account nodes, e.g. ou=users,dc=example,dc=com

searchUsername.label: LDAP username attribute
searchUsername.subtext: The LDAP attribute on a user object which represents the user's username (what they will enter in the username field when signing in).

nameField.label: LDAP given name attribute
nameField.subtext: The LDAP attribute on a user object which represents the user's full display name.

emailField.label: LDAP email attribute
emailField.subtext: The LDAP attribute on a user object which represents the user's email address.

filter.label: Additional LDAP filter criteria
filter.subtext: An optional LDAP query fragment that will be included in the user search. This is not commonly used. See RFC2254.

caCert.label: LDAP CA certificate
caCert.subtext: This is only necessary if your server supports SSL and is using a private CA not in the common trusted set. Note that it does NOT work to enter the LDAP server's own certificate here -- it must be the certificate of a CA which has signed the LDAP server's certificate.

adminIdentityProviderConfigureSaml.title: SAML login configuration
adminIdentityProviderConfigureSaml.explanation: Your SAML IDP should be configured to return a persistent nameID. In addition, if you are not using Active Directory, you must configure your IDP to provide two extra attributes, email and displayName.
adminIdentityProviderConfigureSaml.serviceUrl: The Service URL of this server is: %s
adminIdentityProviderConfigureSaml.logoutUrl: The Service Logout URL of this server is: %s
adminIdentityProviderConfigureSaml.metadataUrlAt: If your SAML IDP supports reading the service provider metadata from a URL, then you can point it at: __text__

baseUrlChanged.explanation: 因為 BASE_URL 而被停用

organizationSettingsBlurb.explanation: 沙聚雲讓您可以建立組織。__Sandstorm allows you to define an organization. You can automatically apply some settings to all members of your organization. Users within the organization will automatically be able to log in, install apps, and create grains.

emailToggle.label: 自動認證電郵信箱
emailToggle.subtext: 注意：因為電郵登入設定未完成，所以無法使用。

emailDomain.label: 網域：
emailDomain.subtext: 使用上記網域信箱的人會自動認證為組織成員。

gappsToggle.label: G Suite 使用者認證
gappsToggle.subtext: 注意：因為 Google 登入設定未完成，所以無法使用。

gappsDomain.label: 網域：
gappsDomain.subtext: 使用上記網域 G Suite 的人會自動認證為組織成員。

ldapToggle.label: LDAP 使用者認證
ldapToggle.subtext: 注意：因為 LDAP 登入設定未完成，所以無法使用。

samlToggle.label: SAML 使用者認證
samlToggle.subtext: 注意：因為 SAML 登入設定未完成，所以無法使用。

disallowGuests.label: 禁止外部訪客進行協作。
disallowGuests.subtext: 只有組織成員可以開啟共享連結。__Users will be required to log in as a member of your organization to view sharing links. Guest access will be disabled.

shareContacts.label: 讓所有使用者可以互相看見
shareContacts.subtext: 讓組織內所有使用者自動互相加進聯絡人清單，以便共享沙粒。若使用者身份應該被隱蔽，請取消此選項。

outbound.title: 外寄郵件
outbound.warning: 外寄郵件尚未設定完成。在您設定完成前，和電郵有關的功能（比如郵件登入、通知、以身份分享或要求存取）都無法使用。

howItWorks.title: 沙聚雲如何使用電郵
howItWorks.explanation: 沙聚雲寄送通知郵件，並且也允許應用程式寄送。每個應用程式都有一個獨自的電郵位址，所以沙聚雲需要能從可變的「來自」位置寄信。所以 Gmail SMTP 不管用，請採用別的免費服務。更多資訊請參見此處。

address.subtext: SMTP（無加密或 StartTLS 加密）用 port 25，TLS-加密 SMTPS 用 port 465。

returnAddress.label: 沙聚雲伺服器自己的收信位址
returnAddress.subtext: 沙聚雲會用這個位址寄出登入用郵件、要求存取及共享的通知郵件等。此位置也會用在 SMTP envelope。

emailDisablePopup.title: 真的要停用電郵？
emailDisablePopup.explanation: 將會停用所有本沙聚雲的外寄郵件功能，包括電郵、郵件登入、以及郵件通知。

serverTitle.label: 伺服器標題：
serverTitle.subtext: 本伺服器和使用者溝通時使用的名稱。

splashUrl.label: Splash URL (experimental):
splashUrl.subtext: This web page will be displayed in the background behind the login dialog (the home page when logged out). For security reasons, the page must be hosted within this Sandstorm server's wildcard host (otherwise it will be blocked by Content-Security-Policy). We suggest using a static web publishing app like Hacker CMS to host content.WARNING: This feature is experimental; in particular the style and positioning of the login box is subject to change without notice. Please let us know if you'd like to see it stabilize.

signupDialog.label: 註冊對話框：
signupDialog.subtext: 當點擊註冊連結時顯示的文字。

termsOfService.label: 服務條款網址：
termsOfService.subtext: 若有填寫，新使用者將會被要求同意您提供的服務條款。

privacyPolicy.label: 隱私權聲明網址：
privacyPolicy.subtext: 若有填寫，新使用者將會被要求同意您提供的隱私權聲明。

useServerTitleForHomeText.label: 以伺服器標題作為首頁連結
useServerTitleForHomeText.subtext: 將畫面左上角的「Sandstorm」文字改為伺服器標題。

customLoginProviderName.label: 自訂登入按鈕文字
customLoginProviderName.subtext: 將登入畫面的「LDAP 登入」和「SAML 登入」的改成您自訂的文字。

newAdminPreinstalledApps.explanation: 在本頁設定為預裝的應用程式將會自動安裝在所有新使用者的沙聚雲中。

productivitySuite.label: 生產力套件
productivitySuite.subtext: 大部分使用者都會用到這些核心應用程式。

systemSuite.label: 系統程式
systemSuite.subtext: 預裝這些系統程式可以大幅強化沙聚雲的功能性。

allApps.label: 市集上的應用程式
allApps.subtext: 沙聚雲會幫新使用者自動安裝所有被勾選的程式。
allApps.moreButton: 顯示另外 %s 個應用程式

appMarketUrl.label: 應用程式市集網址
appMarketUrl.subtext: 設定應用程式頁面的「安裝應用程式」按鈕打開的連結。

enableAppUpdates.label: 啟用程式更新通知
enableAppUpdates.subtext: 沙聚雲伺服器每天都會下載應用程式的更新檔，並且詢問每個使用者是否要進行更新。

appIndexUrl.label: 程式索引網址
appIndexUrl.subtext: 設定沙聚雲伺服器檢查更新用的網址。

ipBlacklist.label: 伺服器端請求 IP 黑名單：
ipBlacklist.subtext: 這些 IP 將無法被使用者請求，包含從應用程式內請求、從使用者指定的網址下載 SPK 檔案等。您每行可以指定一個 IP 或網路（使用 CIDR notation，比如"127.0.0.0/8"）。預設值包含標準的本地端及私人網路位址。另外當使用 HTTP 代理時他可能有自己的黑名單設定，所以這項設定可能會被忽略。

newAdminUserTable.notFound: 沒有使用者符合您的搜尋條件

admin.label: 管理者
admin.explanation: 管理所有帳號。可以安裝應用程式，建立沙粒，以及管理伺服器。

user.label: 使用者
user.explanation: 可以安裝應用程式及建立沙粒。

visitor.label: 訪客
visitor.explanation: 可以二度分享別人分享的沙粒，可是不能安裝應用程式或建立自己的沙粒。

deletePopup.title: 刪除 %s
deletePopup.explanation: 您正在刪除 %s 的帳號。被標記為刪除中的帳號會被停權，管理者有七天的時間取消刪除動作。（在本頁點擊「解除停權」按鈕即可）%s 無法阻止停權和刪除。
deletePopup.detail: 七天後， %s 的帳號將被永遠刪除。刪除帳號將：
deletePopup.detail1: 永遠刪除所有 %s 建立的沙粒
deletePopup.detail2: 撤銷所有 %s 建立的共享連結
deletePopup.detail3: 將 %s 從所有人的聯絡人名單中移除
deletePopup.detail4: 刪除所有本帳號的識別資訊（除非該識別資訊亦被別的帳號使用）

suspendPopup.title: 將 %s 停權
suspendPopup.detail1: 阻止所有 %s 建立的沙粒被開啟
suspendPopup.detail2: 停用所有 %s 建立的共享連結
suspendPopup.detail3: 本帳號的識別資訊亦等同辦理（除非該識別資訊亦被別的帳號使用）

appList.noMatchApp: 找不到名稱含有該字串的應用程式。請試試搜尋市集 »
appList.unauthorizedText: 只有管理者給予權限的的使用者才能安裝應用程式。若需權限，請聯絡管理者。
